The LCONRG Project
==============================

.. toctree::
    :hidden:
    :maxdepth: 1

    license

A Project which calculates the Levelised Cost Of eNeRGy.


Installation
------------

To install the LCONRG project,
run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install lconrg


Usage
-----

LCONRG usage looks like:

.. code-block:: python

   >>> lconrg [OPTIONS]

.. option:: -l <language>, --language <language>

   The Wikipedia language edition,
   as identified by its subdomain on
   `wikipedia.org <https://www.wikipedia.org/>`_.
   By default, the English Wikipedia is selected.

.. option:: --version

   Display the version and exit.

.. option:: --help

   Display a short usage message and exit.
